thread.title: Are Charmed Sisters Shannen Doherty & Holly Marie Combs Feuding??
thread.title_full: Are Charmed Sisters Shannen Doherty & Holly Marie Combs Feuding??

author: Perez Hilton
title: Are Charmed Sisters Shannen Doherty & Holly Marie Combs Feuding??
text:
Sounds like this friendship isn't so Charmed anymore??
It's looking like Shannen Doherty and Holly Marie Combs are no longer friends, which is pretty surprising considering their longtime friendship (TV sisterhood is forever, y'all!).
In case you haven't noticed, the stars haven't posted any pictures to Instagram since June of last year when they both appeared at the Sydney Opera House for an event (above).
Related: Drake & Kid Cudi's Beef Lives On! 
While Holly shared this shot to IG at the time, fans have since taken to the Pretty Little Liars actress' comments to post speculation about their friendship. Five months ago, one wrote:
"verbovetskaya: There hasn't been any pics of you and @theshando recently.😐🤔 so I was wondering, did you guys fight or something?😥😢 Please,don't! 🙏🏻 I feel like my heart is going to break if that's true💔 your friendship has always been like good example for me💞"
They have also both unfollowed each other on the social media app, and it turns out Shan even unfollowed her former BFF on Twitter (Holly still follows Shan though).
See (below)!
Amid her battle with breast cancer, Shannon spoke with Chelsea Handler in an October interview , spilling about how some friends bailed:
"People went, 'Um, no, you're just not fun anymore. You're sick and you're not drinking. You talk about cancer and I don't want to hear any talk about cancer. I want to talk about me.' It was heartbreaking. But at the same time, that's when I go, 'God, cancer is a godsend in a lot of ways because, boy, did it clean house in my life."
We can only speculate who she was talking about...
What do U think happened?
[ Image via Instagram . ]
